name: Apple Pie Crumble

ingredients.name: unpeeled apples, such as Ambrosia, Cortland, Granny Smith, or Honeycrisp, or a mix

preparation: Core apples; chop into 1⁄2" pieces. You should have about 6 cups.
Place apples in Square or Multipurpose Steamer. Stir in sugar, Apple Pie Spice, and lemon juice.
Microwave, uncovered, on high for 5 min, or until apples are tender and saucy.
Meanwhile, in another bowl, stir together topping ingredients.
Remove steamer from microwave. Add 3 tbsp water; mix together. Spoon topping over warm apples; microwave again, uncovered, 5 min.
Serve with Greek yogurt, if desired.
